content: Water management is also expected to play an increasingly central role in adaptation. Climate change is projected to lead to major changes in water availability across Europe with increasing water scarcity and droughts mainly in Southern Europe and increasing risk of floods throughout most of Europe.For more informations visit:  EU Sector Policies Case studies are flagship of the Climate-ADAPT platform, they showcase initiatives that are already being carried out in Europe.They have a comprehensive structure that covers all the key aspects in the implementation cycle of adaptation.Explore all case studiesMarine and coastal ecosystem restoration for climate change adaptation in the Caribbean (Guadalupe, French Oversea region)Restoration and climate adaptation of church ruins, Holla, NorwayManaging the increasing risk of wildfires in a changing climate, Sweden1.
